name: Paddling Out [Disco Elysium]
description:
• DESCRIPTION: A Disco Elysium Interactable FanFiction Game.
  • STORY NAME: Paddling Out (THE REPEATER CORPSE CONUNDRUM)
  • SUMMARY: To the southwest of Revachol, far into the wild pale yonder is a radio repeater station. On this station is a corpse -- a woman killed in cold blood. There is no suspect. There are no clues. It is a thoroughly impossible death, a murder in utter isolation. Two officers arrive on the scene. Voices bleed from the tower above. Something is horribly wrong.
  • AUTHOR/STORY SOURCE: Story by transhitman on AO3.
    • [Story Link] - Story updates much faster on AO3 so check it out there if you can't wait for the game updates!
  • SOURCE CODE: Dysco Elysium FanGame Code by ampepers.
    • [Source Link]
  • GAME CREATOR: StereoSunset (me): Implementation and adaption of codes.
  • WARNINGS: Some cussing, gore, mild alcohol consumption, dark themes. (Rated about Age 16+)
  • REPORTS: Please report any issues or recommendations in the comments section for me to review!
  • COMPATABILITY: I have found it to work well when used on mobile devices, although it is not specifically coded as such.
